course_description: An introduction to the geography, archaeology, history, and cultures of the Middle East from ancient times through the Middle Ages. Major topics include the study of empire, literature, religion, and society. Required of all Middle Eastern Studies majors.
sections: Class Nbr: 1912, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: P. Creamer, Status: Open
